publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4275 Linda Fabiani: The Panchen Lama—That the Parliament notes that 25 April 2006 is the 17th birthday of Gedhun Choekyi Nyima, Tibet’s Panchen Lama; notes that in May 1995, at the age of six, a few weeks after being named by HH The Dalai Lama as the new reincarnation of the Panchen Lama, the second most important leader in Tibet, Gedhun Choekyi Nyima was abducted from his home in Tibet by the Chinese authorities and that no-one there has seen him or heard from him since; sends all good wishes to the Panchen Lama, and urges the international community to continue its efforts to secure his safety.

S2M-4275 Linda Fabiani: The Panchen Lama—That the Parliament notes that 25 April 2006 is the 17th birthday of Gedhun Choekyi Nyima, Tibet’s Panchen Lama; notes that in May 1995, at the age of six, a few weeks after being named by HH The Dalai Lama as the new reincarnation of the Panchen Lama, the second most important leader in Tibet, Gedhun Choekyi Nyima was abducted from his home in Tibet by the Chinese authorities and that no-one there has seen him or heard from him since; sends all good wishes to the Panchen Lama, and urges the international community to continue its efforts to secure his safety.
S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Brian Adam*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4275 The Panchen Lama (lodged on 20 April 2006) Alasdair Morgan*
